mapper.insert: insert into users_message (id, name, phone, sender, post_time, type, title, message, url, model, is_read, read_time, mark, open_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isRead,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{readTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update users_message set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sender = #{sender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_time = #{postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_read = #{isRead,jdbcType=INTEGER}, read_time = #{readTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mark = #{mark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, phone, sender, post_time, type, title, message, url, model, is_read, read_time, mark, open_id from users_message where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
